title: Game of the Week: How to Watch the Eagles vs. Cowboys Game Online forÂ Free
summary: NFL's biggest rivalry is facing off on Sunday (Nov. 23) at 4:25 P.M. ET.
body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. Sports fans love a good rivalry game, and there’s no bigger NFL clash up than the Philadelphia Eagles vs the Dallas Cowboys. For ShopBillboard’s Game of the Week , Jalen Hurts and the Birds are headed into Dallas to take on their NFC East rivals, the Cowboys, at AT&T Stadium. Kicking off on Sunday (Nov. 23) at 4:25 P.M. ET, we’ve compiled a guide on how to watch this must-see game online for free and without cable. Eagles vs Cowboys game, at a Glance: Date: Sunday, Nov. 23, 2025 Time: 4:25 p.m. ET TV channels: Fox Streaming: DirecTV , Fubo, Sling TV, Hulu + Live TV The defending Super Bowl champs are still showing their dominance this season with an 8-2 record, but with inconsistent offensive performances, the Eagles have shown cracks in their armor. On the flipside, “America’s team”, the Cowboys, have had to heavily rely on their high power offense this season led by Dak Prescott, CeeDee Lamb and George Pickeâ€¦

summary: Eberechi Eze scores a hat-trick to help Arsenal thump rivals Tottenham 4-1 and go six points clear at the top of the Premier League - despite a moment of magic from Richarlison.

title: Italy win historic third straight Davis Cup
summary: Flavio Cobolli and Matteo Berrettini lead Italy to a historic third straight Davis Cup title in Bologna.

title: Arsenal 'dominated every part of the game' - Arteta

title: Sabrina Carpenter Arrests Maya Rudolph in L.A. for the 69th Show (Wink-Wink) of Her Short nâ€™ Sweet Tour: FullÂ Setlist
summary: "My friends wanted me to inform you: This is our 69th show," Carpenter announced to the Crypto.com Arena crowd on Saturday night.
body: Sabrina Carpenter hit an appropriately cheeky milestone on Saturday during her fifth of six nights at Los Angeles’ Crypto.com Arena: Her 69th concert of the Short n’ Sweet Tour. “My friends wanted me to inform you: This is our 69th show,” Carpenter announced while sitting on her heart-shaped stage, sending the crowd into wild cheers over the spicy stat. Related Sabrina Carpenter ‘Arrests’ SZA at Los Angeles Show: ‘It’s Cuffing Season … SOS for Real’ It’s a fitting marker for the trek: Since its September 2024 kick-off, the Short n’ Sweet Tour has been known for its little suggestive moments, like Carpenter’s nightly “Juno” sex positions (“have you tried this one before?”), the voyeuristic “Bed Chem” video camera (“I bet the thermostat’s set at six-nine”), and the elevator that ticks up the floors until “SC” comes just after the 68th. “We knew we’d get there eventually, and tonight’s the night,” Carpenter said of the 69th show. “And it’s Saturday, and we’re just like, we’re living!”â€¦

title: Rogers 'only getting better' - can he win England battle?
summary: After his double against Leeds, can Morgan Rogers win the battle for England's number 10 role over Jude Bellingham, Phil Foden and Cole Palmer?

title: Frank apologises to Spurs fans after 'extremely painful' defeat
summary: Tottenham Hotspur boss Thomas Frank apologises to fans for their performance in an "extremely painful" 4-1 defeat by Arsenal.

title: Donald Glover Reveals Stroke Caused Him to Cancel Childish Gambino Tour LastÂ Year
summary: He also revealed doctors "found a holeâ€ in his heart and that he underwent two surgeries.
body: Donald Glover is opening up about a recent health scare that forced him to  cancel his tour last year . At the time he described it as an â€œailment,â€ but Glover said Saturday night (Nov. 22) at a performance that a doctor told him heâ€™d had a stroke. Related Tyler, the Creator’s Camp Flog Gnaw Is Coming to Prime Video: How to Watch the Music Festival for Free BeyoncÃ© Makes Surprise Appearance at F1 Las Vegas Grand Prix With Jay-Z Lenny Kravitz Says Fan Ripped Out Dreadlocks During Brisbane Concert Glover, who performs under the moniker  Childish Gambino , shared the information on stage at Tyler, the Creatorâ€™s Camp Flog Gnaw festival in Los Angeles. His remarks were shared widely on social media. â€œYou guys voted for a â€˜where have I been monologue,â€™â€ Glover, 42, said. â€œI had a really bad pain in my head in Louisiana and I did the show anyway. I couldnâ€™t really see well, so when we went to Houston, I went to the hospital and the doctor was like, â€˜You had a stroke.â€™â€ Glover said he felt like he was letting everyone down, lamenting that he still hasnâ€™t been to Ireland. He also revealed that â€œthey found a holeâ€ in his heart and he had to have two surgeries.â€¦

title: â€˜Wicked: For Goodâ€™ Soars to a $150M U.S. Debut, $226MÂ Globally
summary: It's the biggest opening ever for a Broadway musical adaptation, unseating the record set by the first filmâ€™s $112 million launch.
body: Universal Picturesâ€™ two-part Wicked gamble continues to defy gravity at the box office. Just a year after part one brought droves of audiences to movie theaters around the country, even more people bought opening weekend tickets to see the epic conclusion,  Wicked: For Good . According to studio estimates on Sunday, Wicked: For Good earned $150 million from North American theaters in its first days in theaters and $226 million globally. Related Ariana Grande & Cynthia Erivo Bid ‘Wicked’ Farewell on ‘For Good’ Premiere Day in Emotional Posts Every Ariana Grande Acting Role, Ranked Cynthia Erivo Says Protecting Ariana Grande From Aggressive Man at ‘Wicked’ Premiere Was ‘Instinct’ Not only is it the biggest opening ever for a Broadway musical adaptation, unseating the record set by the first filmâ€™s $112 million launch, itâ€™s also the second biggest debut of the year behind  A Minecraft Movie â€™s $162 million. â€œThe results are just fantastic,â€ said Jim Orr, who heads domestic distribution for Universal. â€œSome films can deliver a false positive when tickets go on sale early butâ€¦

title: Q3 2025 Earnings Roundup: Hereâ€™s What Every Music Company MadeÂ (Updating)
summary: A recap of every label, streamer and other major music company's third quarter earnings results.
body: A flurry of earnings reports for the quarter ended Sept. 30 show a continued divide in the music landscape. Live music companies such as Live Nation and MSG Entertainment posted double-digit growth as concert demand surged, while HYBE and SM Entertainment also benefitted from strong concert revenues. Streaming also spiked once again, pushing Spotify and Universal Music Group (UMG) to double-digit revenue growth. Legacy media didn’t fare as well, however: iHeartMedia revenue slipped slightly, while SiriusXM leveraged cost-cutting to compensate for flat revenue.  Hereâ€™s a running list, in alphabetical order, of the music companies that released earnings results (as of Nov. 20) for the quarter ended Sept 30, 2025.  Related Which Music Companies Had the Best Stock Returns in the Last Three Years? title: Taylor Swiftâ€™s â€˜The Fate of Opheliaâ€™ Reigns on U.K. Charts for FifthÂ Week
summary: The song is Swift's longest-running U.K. No. 1 for three years.
body: Taylor Swift has held onto the top spot of the U.K. Singles Chart for a fifth non-consecutive week with â€œThe Fate of Opheliaâ€ (Nov. 21). Related Taylor Swift on Ice: Olympic Figure Skaters Share Mesmerizing Routine Set to ‘Fate of Ophelia’ ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ HUNTR/X Singers Set to Slay the 2025 Macyâ€™s Thanksgiving Day Parade: See the Full Lineup Olivia Dean Shines With â€˜Man I Needâ€™ and â€˜Let Alone the One You Loveâ€™ in â€˜SNLâ€™ Debut: Watch The single first shot to No. 1 on the U.K. charts dated Oct. 10, and held the spot for three consecutive weeks. Following a back-and-forth tussle with KPop Demon Hunters â€™ â€œGolden,â€ Swift regained the No. 1 spot last week (Nov. 14) and she now extends her streak for a second week. â€œThe Fate of Opheliaâ€ is Swiftâ€™s longest-running U.K. No. 1 single since â€œAnti-Heroâ€ from 2022â€™s Midnights earned six weeks at No. 1; â€œIs It Over Now? (Taylorâ€™s Version)â€ (2023) and â€œFortnightâ€ (2024) lasted just a single week each. â€œThe Fate of Opheliaâ€ appears on The Life of a Showgirl , her 14th U.K. No. 1 album. Swift boasts the most No. 1s on the U.K. Albums Charts for an international artist, and ties for second overall with Tâ€¦

title: 5 Seconds of Summerâ€™s â€˜Everyoneâ€™s a Starâ€™ Shoots to No. 1 on U.K. AlbumsÂ Chart
summary: The Aussie band has previously hit the top spot three times.
body: 5 Seconds of Summer is No. 1 on the U.K. Albums Chart for the fourth time in their career. On the charts dated Nov. 21, the Australian groupâ€™s EVERYONEâ€™S A STAR knocks Taylor Swift ‘s The Life of a Showgirl from the top spot. Related 5 Seconds of Summer Shines on ARIA Chart With â€˜Everyoneâ€™s A Star!â€™ Olivia Dean Puts Ticketmaster, AEG on Blast for Her Tour’s Ticket Resale Prices: ‘You Are Providing a Disgusting Service’ Here Are 13 Songs Taylor Swift Wrote for Other Artists The group, composed of Calum Hood, Ashton Irwin, Luke Hemmings and Michael Clifford, has hit No. 1 on three previous occasions: Sounds Good Feels Good (2015), CALM (2020) and 5SOS5 (2022). EVERYONEâ€™S A STAR is also No. 1 on the Official Record Store Chart, which tracks the most popular album in U.K. independent record shops this week.  In their home nation of Australia, the Sydney four-piece had a record-breaking week as they became the first act in the history of the ARIA Charts to hit No. 1 with their first six studio albums. Olivia Dean â€™s The Art of Loving closes the week at No. 2 and follows a stylish performance on Saturday Night Live last weekend (Nov. 15) of â€œMâ€¦

title: Romeo Santos Makes Surprise Appearance at Bad Bunnyâ€™s Show in theÂ DR
summary: They sang "BOKeTE" together to the rhythm of bachata.
body: Bad Bunny surprised his fans in the Dominican Republic on Saturday night (Nov. 22) by inviting the biggest star in bachata to the stage. On the second day of his DebÃ­ Tirar MÃ¡s Fotos World Tour at the Estadio OlÃ­mpico FÃ©lix SÃ¡nchez in Santo Domingo, Romeo Santos appeared near the end of the show, eliciting deafening screams from the crowd. Related Bad Bunny’s DebÃ­ Tirar MÃ¡s Fotos World Tour Setlist: Every Song From the Dominican Republic Night One Here Are the Latin Grammys 2025 Winners: Bad Bunny and Ca7riel & Paco Amoroso Top List With 5 Each Bad Bunny Is No. 1 on Billboard’s Top Latin Artists of the 21st Century Chart Together, they delivered a thrilling performance of “BOKeTE” — in bachata style. Originally a slow song with an ethereal and shoegaze essence, the track is included on Benito’s critically acclaimed album DebÃ­ Tirar MÃ¡s Fotos , which reached No. 1 on the Billboard 200 chart and recently won the Latin Grammy for album of the year. This is not the first time these artists have joined forces. Four years ago, in 2021, Bad Bunny and Aventura â€” the mega-successful group with which Santos rose to stardom â€” collaborateâ€¦

title: Gaelic Warrior beats Fact To File in John Durkan thriller
summary: Gaelic Warrior holds off a late charge from stablemate Fact To File to win a thrilling John Durkan Chase at Punchestown.

title: Benavidez inflicts brutal defeat on Britain's Yarde
summary: British light-heavyweight Anthony Yarde loses his third shot at a world title as WBC champion David Benavidez stops him in the seventh round of their bout in Saudi Arabia.

title: BeyoncÃ© Makes Surprise Appearance at F1 Las Vegas Grand Prix WithÂ Jay-Z
summary: The singer also took a high-speed hot lap driven by seven-time world champion Lewis Hamilton.
body: BeyoncÃ© made an unexpected on-track appearance at the Formula 1 Las Vegas Grand Prix on Sun., Nov. 23, drawing widespread attention as she and Jay-Z arrived at the paddock ahead of the race. The Houston-born singer looked race-ready as she was first photographed in a sleek, custom Louis Vuitton jumpsuit zipped to the neckline as she walked through the paddock before the race, with Formula 1â€™s official accounts highlighting her arrival. BeyoncÃ© also shared her own look inside the Grand Prix, posting a video on Instagram that showed her stepping into the passenger seat of a Ferrari supercar before taking a high-speed hot lap with Lewis Hamilton. The clip captured the pair preparing for the run, with BeyoncÃ© captioning it simply: â€œGive it to Mama.â€ The visit marked one of the most high-profile celebrity sightings of the weekend, which has evolved into one of the most entertainment-driven stops on the global F1 calendar. Hamilton â€” long one of F1â€™s key crossovers into music and fashion culture â€” was later photographed chatting with both BeyoncÃ© and Jay-Z on the grid. The pair previously met behind the scenes at a Grand Prix in 2009, making this a rare reunion at one of the sportâ€™s mosâ€¦

title: White beaten by Szubarczyk, 14, in UK qualifying
